001package com.technototes.library.control;
002
003import java.util.function.BooleanSupplier;
004
005/** Class for bindings to extend
006 * @author Alex Stedman
007 *
008 */
009public interface Binding<T extends BooleanSupplier> extends BooleanSupplier {
010    /** Button type
011     *
012     */
013    enum Type {
014        NONE_ACTIVE,
015        SOME_ACTIVE,
016        ALL_ACTIVE,
017    }
018
019    T[] getSuppliers();
020
021    Type getDefaultType();
022
023    @Override
024    default boolean getAsBoolean() {
025        return get(getDefaultType());
026    }
027
028    /** Get this as boolean for the type
029     *
030     * @param type The type to get boolean as
031     * @return If the binding meets the criteria
032     */
033    default boolean get(Type type) {
034        boolean on = false, off = getSuppliers().length == 0;
035        for (T s : getSuppliers()) {
036            if (s.getAsBoolean()) {
037                on = true;
038            } else {
039                off = true;
040            }
041        }
042        switch (type) {
043            case NONE_ACTIVE:
044                return !on;
045            case ALL_ACTIVE:
046                return !off;
047            default:
048                return on;
049        }
050    }
051
052    default boolean get() {
053        return get(getDefaultType());
054    }
055}
